Model Updates

Changes that matter, not a press-release fan club.

Promptingpromptsworkflow
Structured prompts outperform vibes (again).
Structure beats storytelling when you want consistent results.
Image Toolsimagedesign
Style consistency is improving, but text is still a liar.
Consistency up. Text still messy. Plan accordingly.
Agentsagentsdev
Agent failures are mostly tool wiring, not model ‘intelligence’.
Your agent isn’t dumb. Your glue code is.
SEOseocontent
AI content sites that win are ‘useful databases’, not blogs.
Databases + structure beat random posting.
Usagepromptscreator
People are fatigued by ‘prompt dumps’. They want packs with purpose.
Stop dumping prompts. Curate them like a sane person.
OpenAImodelsdev
GPT-5.2 pushes harder on real work: code, tools, long context.
More useful for shipping work, especially with structure.
OpenAIvoiceproductivity
ChatGPT Voice follows instructions better (and repeats less).
Voice is less goofy and more obedient now.
OpenAIsafetypolicy
Age prediction is rolling out to apply stronger teen safety defaults.
More guardrails for teens, more consistency for youth-safe experiences.
Anthropicmodelsagents
Claude Opus 4.5 leans into coding + agents, with stronger robustness.
Better for serious coding + agent work, especially when you wire it properly.
Googlemodelsmultimodal
Gemini 3 expands reasoning + multimodal capability across Google products.
Gemini’s getting more capable, especially inside Google’s own stack.
Anthropicdevapi
Claude API: structured outputs support expands, and older models keep getting retired.
Production users: pin versions and stop ignoring deprecation notes.
